name: Monster Slice - Cut & Corner The Scary Creatures!
name_original: Monster Slice - Cut & Corner The Scary Creatures!
description:
Things are about to get cute-scary! Cut, slice, slash and dash your way through over 50 levels of monster insanity! It's time to corner those beasties and you'll need quick fingers and sharp thinking to avoid the cute monster spinners...

Set to an awesome action soundtrack with epic graphics, this classic slash game will keep you entertained for hours.

Cute action-packed monster slash games have never been this fun!
